With an improved and vegan formula*, NIVEA Soft contains 95% naturally derived ingredients**, plus Vitamin E and Natural Jojoba Oil for lasting softness. Gentle enough for daily use on all skin types, this dry skin cream works effectively for the whole family, including those with sensitive skin.
